column4: Looking for a new, #COVIDsafe adult #Halloween tradition this year? Please consider donating blood to @RIBloodCenter. It‚Äôs not spooky, but it could help save a life. Unfortunately, there is a critical blood shortage in RI right now. Be a hero this Halloween & #donateblood.

Amidst the hardship of #COVID, it‚Äôs heartwarming to see people doing their part to protect the health & safety of others. This virus has reshaped many things, but it hasn‚Äôt changed our shared values or the basic goodness of people. Thanks to all those making a difference!

COVID is keeping us apart, but the only way to effectively combat it is by working together. We must each do our part. Please #WearAMask. Please take proper #COVID precautions. I know #COVIDFatigue is real, but the virus is spreading & we all need to step up to help save lives.

Instead of passing #COVIDrelief, Senate Republicans rushed to the WH to clink #SCOTUS champagne flutes & then skipped town. But not before scheduling the 1st vote of the #lameduck session on‚Ä¶ wait for it‚Ä¶ a judicial nominee. Americans deserve better. https://t.co/YnprtDs0QY

When a #COVIDvaccine is ruled scientifically safe, it should be FREE for all Americans.
Trump Admin initially was going to let #redtape force some seniors to pay.
I intro'ed the Ensuring Access to COVID-19 Vaccines for Seniors Act (S. 4825). Now Trump Admin is reversing course.

QUESTION: Why are Senate Republicans rushing this process & putting 1 person's #SCOTUS nomination above the health & welfare of the nation?
¬†
ANSWER: https://t.co/GHXPbzI6oF

Make no mistake: Tonight‚Äôs #SCOTUS vote isn‚Äôt about 1 individual. It's about the GOP jeopardizing #healthcare for 20 million+ Americans during a pandemic. It's about eliminating protections for 100M+ Americans with #preexisting conditions. We must #ProtectOurCare.

Heading to the Senate floor to oppose the #SCOTUS nomination of Judge Amy Coney Barrett & condemn this rushed, irregular process - undertaken in the midst of a pandemic - that wrongly prioritizes 1 person‚Äôs lifetime appointment over the health & welfare of the American people.

SMOKING GUN PROOF: Pres Trump is rushing an extreme, lifetime #SCOTUS nominee (w/ help of Senate GOP) to terminate the #AffordableCareAct. Ripping away people's healthcare in midst of a pandemic will harm public health & further destabilize the economy. https://t.co/4uCKWQBCaA

The U.S. Senate must help combat #COVID; deliver relief for struggling families, biz & communities; & turn our economy around.
Instead, GOP leaders chose a lifetime job for 1 extreme #SCOTUS nom. over #publichealth, the health of our economy, & the needs of hardworking Americans. https://t.co/eImNNwYp81

Outrageous. After 5 months of inaction, Sen. McConnell scheduled a #showvote on a cynical ‚Äòskinny‚Äô #COVIDrelief bill that is completely inadequate. The American people deserve solutions, not stunts & backroom double-dealing.
https://t.co/pSDerWKb2P

There are certain things all RIers share: a (401) area code, a love of good food, & knowing how to navigate using landmarks that no longer exist. 
Another thing we should all have: access to affordable health care. #AffordableHealthCare is on the ballot this Nov. #ProtectOurCare

Good news for helping people in crisis: Last night, Pres Trump signed into law a bill I co-authored to designate 9-8-8 as a nat'l #suicideprevention & #mentalhealth crisis hotline. @800273TALK remains accessible 1-800-273-8255 (TALK). New 3-digit number will take effect in 2022.
RT @SenWhitehouse: 21.1 million Americans will lose their health coverage if the Supreme Court strikes down the ACA. #WhatsAtStake

Having #healthinsurance can be the difference between life & death. The Trump Admin is suing in federal court to get #SCOTUS to strike down the #ACA & eliminate critical health protections for millions of Americans. We must #ProtectOurCare. The best way to do that is to vote.

Pres Trump must stop spreading false conspiracy theories. Questioning the brave special operators who conducted the bin Laden raid undermines America and is disrespectful to the entire U.S. military & diminishes the sacrifices our service members make.
https://t.co/iNAEWbE5fq

Proud of my 100% score on @cleanh20action #CleanWaterScorecard. Clean water & a healthy environment are essential resources we can't do without. I pledge to keep pushing to support science, protect our environment, & address the very real threat of climate change.

The battle to #ProtectOurCare impacts ALL Americans, regardless of where they get their #healthcoverage. Republicans want to put insurance companies back in charge & return to days when insurers could charge more, limit care, & deny coverage to people w/ #preexisting conditions.

Sen. McConnell has led 30 votes to kill the #AffordableCareAct & 30 times he‚Äôs failed. Now he wants to rush through a #SCOTUS nominee whose 1 vote can take away #healthcare from 20M+ Americans & eliminate protections for 130M+ more. That isn't democracy. Americans deserve better.

I‚Äôm working to prevent the Trump Admin from taking away people‚Äôs #healthcare. @SenateDems are forcing a vote tomorrow to block A.G. Barr from using taxpayer dollars to support Trump‚Äôs lawsuit to overturn the #AffordableCareAct (#ACA). Urge the U.S. Senate to #ProtectOurCare!

Congress must swiftly investigate Trump Admin‚Äôs misuse of $300M in #CDC funds that could have gone to helping #COVID patients & developing a vaccine, but was instead diverted to a wasteful, self-promoting propaganda campaign.

After months of inaction, the GOP's #COVID bill failed because it was an inadequate, negligent package that would leave millions in the lurch. We need to pass a bill that protects hospitals, nursing homes, frontline workers, & communities hit hardest by the virus...now.

Congressional Republicans took a break from their work responding to #COVID, but the virus didn‚Äôt take a pause. Thousands are dying & millions have contracted COVID. Americans deserve more than a partisan show vote -- they need a comprehensive response & overdue assistance.
Hope you have a safe, enjoyable #LaborDay. Today is a great day to support local businesses & honor workers who are on the job by wearing a mask & maintaining a safe social distance.

This #LaborDay, we salute America's working men & women whose hard work & dedication built our nation & continue to propel it forward, even amidst a pandemic. We are grateful for those whose activism & organization won hard fought gains that continue to benefit all workers. https://t.co/etLHrsQj4H

COVID-19 has transformed how we live, work & grieve. But it hasn‚Äôt changed who we are or limited our capacity to care for one another. All of us have reason to hope & remain vigilant. Brighter days lay ahead. But today we pause to reflect on those we‚Äôve lost & honor their lives.

Each of us must ask: How can we do a better job going forward to prevent the loss of more lives? We are each other‚Äôs keepers. It is up to every single one of us to do our part (#WearAMask #SocialDistance etc) to keep ourselves & each other healthy & safe.

Accompanying our grief are other emotions: Anger at the virus. Gratefulness to those who‚Äôve helped & supported us thru this pandemic. Faith & perseverance to see us thru & help us heal. Resolve to strengthen our preparedness and response in order to keep RIers healthy & safe.

We pause & reflect on the toll this pandemic has taken & grieve those gone too soon. 1,000+ RI lives lost to COVID19: a staggering, immeasurable loss of neighbors, friends, & family. We mourn every one of them & our hearts ache for those they left behind. https://t.co/8Sr5v1jOnq

America‚Äôs economic stability & success depend on getting #COVID19 under control. U.S. needs an evidence-based approach to improving #publichealth. That means more federal $$$ to help schools, businesses, hospitals, communities & states plan & execute effective strategies.
